cms.contentitemcommondata.BasicItemShortDescription: Kentio's SaaS offering for Xperience by Kentico handles the responsibility of infrastructure and deployment management for developers, using established technologies in Azure like App Service and deployment slots. Milan Lund explains the details on how this technology impacts Lucene search indexes and his solution to post-deployment index rebuilding.
cms.contentitemcommondata.BasicItemTitle: Handling Search Index Rebuilds in Xperience by Kentico’s SaaS Environment
